species.name: binacle
descriptions: After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they adhere themselves to it and live together. They cooperate to gather food during high tide.
If the two don’t work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won’t survive.
They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.
Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

abilities.name: tough-claws
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.

abilities.name: sniper
abilities.effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

abilities.name: pickpocket
abilities.effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.
